verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy Ghost come down upon Thy Children Give us grace and make us Thine Thy cleansing fires within us kindle Blessed Spirit - Dove Divine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh have we grieved Thee Gracious Spirit Wayward wanton cold are we And still our sins and many wanderings Never yet have wearied Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Dear Paraclete how hast Thou waited While our hearts were slowly turned How often hath Thy love been slighted While for us it grieved and burned{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now in our hearts O blessed Spirit We would take Thee for our Lord In perfect love now make us faithful To Thy least and lightest word{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Comforter tho' now we cannot Love Thee as Thou lovest us If in our hearts Thy flame be kindled They shall not be always thus{/lang-eng}
